description: The first webOS app for Salesforce.com. Features include: A dashboard with graphical data and the ability to export graphs. Detailed information on Accounts, Contacts, Opportunities and Leads, with search functionality. The ability to call and email contacts and leads. The ability to call accounts, and integrated maps of the account locations. Auto-login, and user details cached for easy login procedures. Currently in BETA, please find links under the Help menu to provide any feedback or customizations. You may need to refer to the Retrieve Security Token link under Help if you require a Salesforce security token. Please note, you currently need an Enterprise, Unlimited or Developer plan on Salesforce.com to utilize this app.
